participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Caring, active, and dedicated, always balancing work and personal interests.
participant_1.background: I'm a busy nurse but I love playing basketball on the weekends. I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change. I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by. My heart is full of love for my family and friends. My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easygoing, family-oriented, and enjoys the little things in life.
participant_2.background: I love to eat pizza, it helps me to relax and forget about my anxiety. I have a family who works in the retail industry, so I often get discounts on my favorite clothes. I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad. I enjoy eating fruit with my child when we spend time together. I enjoy playing tennis with my mother, and it is a great way for us to stay fit.

content.text: Great! I'm having some pizza for lunch.  I just love pizza.
That's awesome! I love pizza too.  I'm getting ready for a basketball game.
That's great! I love basketball.  I played in high school.
I used to play in high school too.  I'm a nurse now.  Do you work?
Yes, I work in the retail industry.  I love shopping!
That's awesome!  I love shopping too.  I like to collect cycling-related items.  It reminds me of my father.
That's really sweet.  I used to ride my bike with my dad in the country side.  It was so much fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun.  I love spending time with my family.  I have a child and we love to eat fruit together.  It's a great way to stay healthy.
That sounds so sweet.  I love spending time with my family too.  I love playing tennis with my mother.  It's a great way for us to stay fit.
